mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TALENT_CONTENT( TALENT_NO, TUTOR_NO, TC_SUBJECT, TC_MAX_CLIENT, TC_PRICE_DETAIL, TC_TT_MESSAGE, TC_TT_INFO, TC_CLASS_INFO, TC_CLASS_TAGET, TC_CURRICULUM, TC_IMAGE_PATH, TC_VIDEO_PATH, TC_LOCATION) VALUES ( #{talent_no}, #{tutor_no}, #{tc_subject}, #{tc_max_client}, #{tc_price_detail}, #{tc_tt_message}, #{tc_tt_info}, #{tc_class_info}, #{tc_class_taget}, #{tc_curri}, #{tc_image_path}, #{tc_video_path}, #{tc_location} #{tc_location} )
